1.desc: You've gato send me lynx to all your favfurrrite pages right meow!

2.desc: I have so many pictures of my cat... I should start a catllection. Or put them in a time catsle!

3.desc: What's it like not tabby tired so often? Purhaps I'll drink a catuccino!

4.desc: I knead to be at the airpurrrt soon so an airplane can fly meowt of here! Hope there is minimal furbulence!

5.desc: Why was the sad cat in a hurry? It was a Russian Blue!

6.desc: Let's get some extra guacameowly to go with our chips and furritos!

7.desc: Spring cleaning time is here; gato do mousework!

8.desc: Don't furrrget to bring all the booze and whisker to the pawty!

9.desc: The mewn and stars are shining furry bright tonight. I love looking at meowter space!

10.desc: What did the cat say when his tail was accidentally stepped on? MeOWWW!
